source_files.name: lib/hello_world.ex
source_files.source:
defmodule HelloWorld do
  @moduledoc """
  Documentation for HelloWorld.
  """

  @doc """
  Hello world.

  ## Examples

      iex> HelloWorld.hello()
      :world

  """
  def hello do
    :world
  end

  def add(x, y) do
    x + y
  end

  def sub(x, y) do
    add(x, -1 * y)
  end

  def mul(x, y) do
    x * y
  end
end
